Bash(gh pr create --title "feat\(payment\): add cashier my-transactions view with export" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add "My Transactions" tab for cashiers to view their own payment history
- Add transaction detail modal with complete payment information
- Add PDF and CSV export functionality for cashier transactions
- Auto-populate cashier name in PDF export signature

## Features
- **My Transactions Tab**: Cashiers can view all payments they''ve processed
- **Transaction Detail Modal**: View complete details including customer info, payment allocations, and OR number
- **PDF Export**: Professional report with header, transaction table, and signature section
- **CSV Export**: Raw data export for further analysis
- **Date Range Filter**: Filter transactions by date range

## Test plan
- [ ] Login as cashier and verify "My Transactions" tab appears
- [ ] Process a payment and verify it shows in My Transactions
- [ ] Click on a transaction to view details modal
- [ ] Test PDF export with date range filter
- [ ] Test CSV export
- [ ] Verify cashier name appears in PDF signature section

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/blank/Desktop/Projects/Personal_Projects/Water_Billing/initao-water-billing commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(payment\): add processWaterBillPayment method to PaymentService

Add two new methods to PaymentService:
- getWaterBillDetails\(\): fetches bill with relationships for payment form
- processWaterBillPayment\(\): processes water bill payment with full
  Payment, PaymentAllocation, and CustomerLedger entry creation

Uses lockForUpdate\(\) to prevent race conditions and requires full payment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
